DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the symptoms and satisfaction for women taking drospirenone (DRSP)-containing combined oral contraceptives in comparison with women taking other kind of combined oral contraceptives.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Drospirenone-containing or -Not Containing Combined Oral Contraceptives on General and Sexual Well-being
DOC.criteria: According to the label of the prescribed Combined Oral Contraceptive (COC) first Combined Oral Contraceptive use or previous Combined Oral Contraceptive use intention to use current COC for 1 year at least Contraindications listed in the label of the prescribed Combined Oral Contraceptive (COC)
